artist: Artist: Jacks Ashley McNamara; Author: Will Hall; Publisher: The Icarus Project

description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical image of landscape with three figures printed in offset lithography with letterpress text on wove paper covers; 52 pp.

medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Harm Reduction Guide to Coming Off Psychiatric Drugs
